title: Billyscottland
author: Billyscottland
created_time: June 07, 2023, 11:24:28 PMLast edit: October 10, 2023, 10:30:22 PM by Billyscottland
content: Good afternoon, forum members. Now I'm working on my own token, presale, earlier in 2022 I've launched several projects, after the events of TerraLuna, FTX the launch of new tokens became irrelevant, now in the season of altcoins and memcoin boom the launch of new tokens is relevant again)).Test launched a week ago to test, everything still works. Looking for an investor partner to launch. The amount of investment needed is $7500. Implementation period of 1 week. Payback x3-x5 of the investment. All the technical part I undertake, for the project found ambassadors, bloggers to promote, marketing channels, site placement are all found. I know how everything is arranged) as a guarantee for the investor before the sale will give a pledge in tokens in advance. The project is not a scam, hanypot, etc. Â There will be a full audit, verification of the project, prepared documentation.If interested, send a message in L.S. or in Telegram.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Quote from: Billyscottland on June 07, 2023, 11:24:28 PMPayback x3-x5 of the investment. First Im not a potential investor, but if you're willing, can you elaborate more on this part? It seems interesting to know. To my knowledge, this is no longer the way to convince people no matter how good the project is. Market interest is unpredictable these days.Unless you can vouch that return, then send loan proposals to local banks around you instead.

comments.author: Billyscottland
comments.body: Quote from: rat03gopoh on June 09, 2023, 03:12:55 PMQuote from: Billyscottland on June 07, 2023, 11:24:28 PMPayback x3-x5 of the investment. First Im not a potential investor, but if you're willing, can you elaborate more on this part? It seems interesting to know. To my knowledge, this is no longer the way to convince people no matter how good the project is. Market interest is unpredictable these days.Unless you can vouch that return, then send loan proposals to local banks around you instead.Yes, of course, all the details and the whole plan of action I will leave to my partner, I can't talk about it in public.The market is not predictable only for users, if you look at the market from developer's point of view, it is quite readable, to realize this you need to participate in the development of a crypto project several times, then you will look at the world of crypto completely differently and everything will fall into place.Everything will work through a smart contract, after the launch of sales in 1 week automatically partner can take his share, liquidity will automatically go on the exchange, for users tokens will have a lock for 6 months, for the investor no that will provide guarantees for the partner.The total amount needed 37,500, 30,000 of which I have, including credit money. Therefore, I am looking for a partner on the forum.I have another branch on the forum, you can go and read there I answer more questions.Thanks for the question all the best to you.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: How many threads do you think are enough for your project? You have created more than 4 topics with the same content, and if you think that creating more topics will help you in promoting your topic, then you are wrong. This is spam, against the forum rules, and you may end up being banned, lock all the last topics and answer the questions in the one where you got the most responses enough.

comments.author: Billyscottland
comments.body: Dear forum users, I found a partner who invested the necessary amount, thank you for your time and read my message. A little later, when everything is ready, I will write you here pre-sale wallet, so you can in real time to keep track of how the sale, and also at the end of sales I will sum up and say what amount has been collected. Thank you my friends

comments.author: Billyscottland
comments.body: Quote from: Husires on June 10, 2023, 02:43:05 AMHow many threads do you think are enough for your project? You have created more than 4 topics with the same content, and if you think that creating more topics will help you in promoting your topic, then you are wrong. This is spam, against the forum rules, and you may end up being banned, lock all the last topics and answer the questions in the one where you got the most responses enough.I posted them in different language branches and in the appropriate sections. I didn't know that it violated the rules of the forum. I thought it was okay since the threads were not in 1 category. Thanks for letting me know about that. I want to apologize to the forum for that, sorry I really didn't know friends
